Datastructures.Statistics

Class DataStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • Datastructures.Statistics.Statistic
      • Datastructures.Statistics.DataStatistics
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CentralProcessorStatistics, PreProcessorStatistics, ResolutionStatistics, WalkerStatistics

    public class DataStatistics
extends Statistic
    The statistics objects of this class collect information typically generated by the simplifications when tasks are executed. The class can be subclassed to add more statistics. Created by ohlbach on 24.10.2018.
